verses.content: Chun, chu hnunga chun Mosie le Aron chu an va feh a, Pharao kuomah, “Hieng ang hin LALPA, Israel Pathien chun a tih, ‘Thlalêra ka kuoma ruoi an ṭhe theina dingin ka mihai chu infetir rawh,’ a tih,” an tih a.
Pharao chun, “Israelhai infetir dinga a rawl ka ngai ding LALPA chu tûm a na? LALPA chu ka hriet ngai nawh a, chu nawa khawm, Israelhai chu infetir naw bawk ka tih,” a tih a.

Anni chun, “Hebraihai Pathien chun a mîn tuokpui tah a, kan ngên che, LALPA kan Pathien kuoma inthâwi dingin thlalêra ni thum lam chenah mîn fetir rawh; chuong naw chun kan chungah kâwlhnâmin amanih, hriin amanih tla rawi a tih,” an tih a.
Aigupta lal chun an kuomah, “Nangni Mosie le Aron hin iengti- zieha mipuihai hi an sinthawhaia in- thawk in inchawltir am? In sin chu va thaw ṭawk ṭawk unla a ni el,” a tih a.
Pharao bawk chun, “Ngai ta, tuhin hi rama mihai hi an tam ta hleh a; an sinhaia inthawk in inchawltir el a!” a tih a.
Chu ni ma chun mipuihai sinthaw hotuhai le an hotuhai chu Pharao chun thu a pêk a,
“Kha hma ang khan mipuihai chu ṭêklei siem dingin bupâwl pe ngai ta naw unla, fe hai sienla, an bupâwl ding chu annîn inkhâwm lem raw hai se.

Chun, kha hmaa ṭêklei an siem zât tho kha siem dingin phût unla, ieng kawng khawmin suktlâwm naw ro: an tha a bo sih a; chuleiin annâwm, ‘Mîn fetir la, kan Pathien kuomah mîn thâwitir rawh,’ tiha an khêk hi.
Chuong mihai chunga chun sin rik lem chu innghat ni raw se; inrimtaka an thaw theina dingin; chun, thu teplo mei mei chu ngaisak naw bawk raw hai se,” a tih a.
Chun, mipuihai sinthaw hotu- hai le an hotuhai chu an fe suok a, mipuihai kuoma chun, “Pharao chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Bupâwl chu pe naw ning cheu ah.
Fe unla, in hmu theina naah va la ro: anachu in sinthaw chu suk- tlâwm ni chuong naw nih,’ tiin” an tih a.
Chuongchun, mipuihai chu Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun bupâwl aiah bu kûng la khâwm ding chun an indar ta sup sup a.
Sinthaw hotuhai chu, “Bupâwl umsa laia in sinthawhai, in ni tin sinthawhai ang kha tlingtla ro,” tiha nawr sênin ṭul namên loin an ṭûl a.

Pharao sinthaw hotuhaiin mi- pui chunga Israel thla, hotua an siehai chu, “Vawisûn le zâni khawm, kha hma anga ṭêklei siema in sinthawhai chu iengdinga in tlingtla naw am a na?” tiha suosal le vuokin an um tah a.
Chun, Israel thla hotuhai chu Pharao kuomah an hung a, an khêk a, “I siehlawhai hi iengdinga hienga i mi thaw am a na?

I siehlawhai hi bupâwl pêk kan ni nawh a, kan kuomah, ‘Ṭêklei siem ro,’ an ti sih a! Chun, ngai ta, i sie- hlawhai hi vuokin kan um a; nisien- lakhawm, ân diknawna chu nangma mihai ngeiah a ni lem,” an tih a.
Pharao ruok chun, “In zawm- thaw, in zawmthaw; chuleichun, ‘Mîn fetir la, LALPA kuomah mîn thâwitir rawh,’ in tih a.
Tuhin fe unla, sin thaw el ro; bupâwl chu pêk ni hliek naw ti niu, ṭêklei ruok chu siem ding zât pângngai chu in pêk suok ngei ding a nih,” a tih a.
Israel thla hotuhai chun, “Ieng kawng khawmin, in ni tin sinthawha ṭêklei siem ding zât chu in suktlâwm ding a ni nawh,” ti hril an ni chun ngîrhmun ṭha nawtaka um an nih ti an inhriet tah a.
Pharao ina inthawka an hung suok chun, anni lo nghâk zingtu Mosie le Aron chu an va hmuh a,
an kuomah, “LALPAIN en cheuin in chungthu chu rêl raw se, keini mi thatna dinga an kuta kâwl- hnâm chawi dingin, Pharao le a siehlawhai mithmuah theidaumah in mi siem ta lei hin,” an tih a.
Chun, Mosie chu LALPA kuom tieng a ngha nâwk a, “Lalpa, iengdinga hi mihai chunga hin thil ṭhanaw thaw am i nih a? Iengdinga i mi tir hrim am?
Pharao kuoma i hminga thu hril dinga ka hung chinah, hi mihai chungah tlatsiet a thawh a, nangin i sansuok dêr si nawh a,” a tih a.
